text: I saw from reddit that if RSP into CSPX and VWRA in IBKR  the fee will be 0.38 only. However I tried myself and I got charged 1.70 (1.85 after GST). Any gurus here know why there is different?
Set up recurring investment in ibkr  fund sgd into ibkr account and ibkr do the rest

Avoid login to UOB TMRW between 11pm to 6am to check your transaction. They do daily calculation during this timing.
